The presidents of our conferences need to realize that it is high time they were placing themselves on the right 
                                                                           377
side of this question. Ministers and teachers are to give to others the light they have received. Their work in every line is needed. God will help them; He will strengthen His servants who stand firmly and will not be swayed from truth and righteousness in order to accommodate self-indulgence. 

                                               -
